website_summaries.verdict: A generously sized TV for large rooms, home theaters, and immersive TV watching and gaming. Notably, it comes with the potential for a few quirks that could affect your viewing experience.
pros: Large 75-inch TV that comes at a reasonable price for a model of its size
A7 intelligent processor is admired by gamers for its speedy motion rate and impressive viewing angels
4K display, Al ThinQ, and rich sound
Nice TV for large rooms and home theaters
cons: A few customers report pixel issues
Blacks aren't as vibrant as expected
Has voice-control remote, but it occasionally loses connection

customer_reviews.title: Died in under a week. LG support is AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: The TV died after a few days. Bad control board. LG support is awful. They're "not sure" if they have the part & will get back to me. That was 9 days ago. Have spent hours on hold.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Lacks Full-Array Dimming
customer_reviews.text: Pros : - Size, - Web OS, - Magic Remote Huge Cons : - Black Levels The TV is beautiful but overpriced (even with Black Friday's price tag) for the highly disappointing black levels produced. On 16:9 letterbox the top and bottom bars are highly visible as the TV is only backlit from the bottom. Dynamic dimming is making it even worse ; almost offensive, you see the black bars dim on and off constantly. I've tried a lot of settings advised on expert websites and it is still disappointing in a normal evening setting. I'm thinking about returning it and get something better. (on a positive note, the sound is great).
customer_reviews.author: Bastien

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: I have had the TV for a few months and love it. Only issue is that sometimes the magic remote drops connection. Other than that...it's an awesome picture.
customer_reviews.author: Hugger1

customer_reviews.title: 120hz Native only. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is fantastic, but the TV has no DP slots and doesn't output 120hz to anything, any way. Had artifacts on screen with new cord. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: SergeantAmerica

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: Best tv we have ever owned. The sound is amazing and also like the fact that you don’t need to turn up the volume half way for it to get loud. I wish my other TVs sounded like this one. The picture is stunning. The smart tv setup is nice and you can download a lot of apps.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: This is my first LG TV, coming from Samsung. First, the shipping, notification process leading to delivery was excellent. Package arrived safe and the 2-man delivery personnel handled it with care - I am impressed. The picture quality is excellent for me. The internal speakers sound good to but I have a receiver with ceiling speakers and a subwoofer so I don't use the internal speakers. I am happy with the TV and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: 4orreal

customer_reviews.title: My New LG Smart 75" TV is a Piece of Art
customer_reviews.text: I love my new LG 75" 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV. There are so many features to have fun with. I turned my TV into a $78 million dollar piece of art = Renoir's The Skiff. I fooled many people doing this. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Masci

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and just appears better and brighter than the Vizio that I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful resolution and quality.  No HBO GO Apps.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is heavy and will need a couple of hands to get it mounted onto the wall. Everything looks and works beautifully. Only giving it a 3 stars since the HBO GO apps is not available at all. Wish I knew this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Overall good TV
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TV a little over a year now. It has a great picture and is good looking and thin. My only complaint is that it constantly drops the Wi-Fi connection. I finally had to hard wire it to the modem. That seemed to fix it plus made it faster.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Dog lover gives this TV a 5
customer_reviews.text: We love this TV. Wonderful sound, no sound bar needed.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Great tv, it beats my 65" by a mile!!!
customer_reviews.text: Still learning on how to use everything but it nice!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Entered the giveaway
customer_reviews.text: Im a single mom working two jobs. I've been saving $ in hopes to a get a tv (we dont have one). I entered the giveaway & hoping to win it. So the $ I saved can then go to getting me & my son bed instead of sleeping on the floor. Here's to hoping...
customer_reviews.author: Logan414

customer_reviews.title: Entered for this giveaway!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already know how amazing lg is now I just need this in my home thank you amazon ❤️
customer_reviews.author: ElvinSS

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this TV! I originally bought it at Best Buy in 2018 (paid way too much for it as you typically do there), but I got over the price tag pretty quickly as the picture on this thing is amazing. My wife and I have watched it every day for the past year and a half and still occasionally remark on how good the picture is. I definitely recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Review on it's way
customer_reviews.text: Been doing a lot of research on this TV. Now they have a giveaway. Either way I'll get this in the near future. Review soon to come
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Torres

customer_reviews.title: Get warranty
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days of using it had to return for replacement because screen died.
customer_reviews.author: adelmo

customer_reviews.title: Entered for giveaway
customer_reviews.text: My old tv broke and I am also broke (not really) just need a replacement to continue gaming it would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: pie-pie-pie

product_meta.title: LG Electronics 75SK8070PUA 75-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description: Size:75-Inch| Style:TVThe SK8070 is crafted with a stylish metal frame that enhances any room. This new LG SUPER UHD TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ becomes the hub for the smart home: Using Intelligent Voice control, speak into the LG Magic Remote to pull up family photos, control light settings, check the weather and more. The α7 (Alpha7) Intelligent Processor works in tandem with the Nano Cell Display to deliver truer colors, deeper black levels and a wider viewing angle, while the local dimming backlight reveals a remarkably accurate picture with dazzling 4K detail. The SK8070 features comprehensive support of major 4K high dynamic range formats including premium Dolby Vision, as well as HDR10 and HLG.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One LG 75SK8070PUA 75-Inch 4K UHD TV, 2018 model, One Magic remote (AN-MR18BA.AUS) with batteries, one power cable, and user manual
TV Dimensions: Without Stand – 66.2" W x 38.3" H x 2.6" D | With Stand – 66.2" W x 41.1" H x 13.8" D | Screen size: 74.5” measured diagonally | Resolution – 3840 x 2160 | Native Refresh Rate – 120Hz
LG TV with AI ThinQ has the Google Assistant built in, so you can control compatible smart home devices using your voice through the Magic Remote. Works with Amazon Alexa devices (sold separately)
α7 Intelligent Processor enhances 4K HDR content for a truly cinematic experience. Enjoy a more lifelike picture with superior depth, sharpness, and remarkably accurate color

Dolby Atmos is the same audio technology developed for state-of-the-art cinemas, with immersive sound that appears to come from everywhere, putting you in the middle of all the excitement. Bluetooth Audio Playback enabled
Inputs: 4 HDMI, 3 USB, 1 RF, 1 Composite in, 1 Ethernet, 1 Optical, 1 RS232C (Mini Jack) and Audio Return Channel Support via HDMI

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
